response.overview: A young lad named Tip carves a pumpkin-headed figure that Mombi brings to life with magical powder. As Mombi celebrates her success, Tip seizes the moment to escape with his newly animated creation. They embark on an adventure that leads them to a country schoolhouse, where they encounter Professor Knowitt and the mischievous Woggle-Bug. Meanwhile, General Jinjur's Army of Revolt, composed of  peasant women, rises against the male-dominated City of Jewels. Along the way, Tip uncovers secrets about his true identity and the enchanting world they navigate, filled with magical transformations, surprising allies, and whimsical encounters.
response.title: The Woggle Bug - The Movie
